dcterms:creator: M. Nazarczuk
K. Mikolajczyk
dcterms:description: Shop-VRB is a visual reasoning dataset, similar to CLEVR, but with complex household objects of different sizes, weights, materials, colors, shapes, and mobility. It includes very small and highly transparent objects and complex backgrounds, which current unsupervised representation learning models cannot handle. The authors generated 10K images with a clean background.
dcterms:title: Shop-VRB-Simple

dcterms:creator: K. Mo
S. Zhu
A. X. Chang
L. J. Guibas
H. Su
dcterms:description: PartNet-Chairs is a dataset where objects are different parts of a chair. Every image shows a chair, where each part of the chair (legs, seat, back, arms) is randomly assigned a color. The dataset includes 5K images paired with 8 descriptive sentences generated from human-written templates.
dcterms:title: PartNet-Chairs
